artist: Artist: Odilon Redon; Printer: Becquet, Paris
creditline: The Miscellaneous Works of Art Purchase Fund, 1956
portfolio: From "Temptation of St. Anthony," 1888, text by Gustave Flaubert
provenance: [Peter Deitsch Fine Arts, New York, until 1956; sold August 1, with 10 other lithographs from same book (P.12,496-P.12,506), for $350, to Mia]
title: C'est le diable, portant sous ses deux ailes..., plate II from "La tentation de Saint Antoine"
